front.reference:
Journal of Scientific & Industrial Research
Vol. 64, May 2005, pp. 364-366

docTitle.titlePart: Ring opening polymerization of ethylene carbonate with base as initiator

byline.docAuthor: A G Patil, U R Kapadi* and D G Hundiwale

byline.affiliation: School of Chemical Sciences, North Maharashtra University,

front.div:
The study presents synthesis of industrially important polymer, polyethylene ether carbonate, via ring opening
polymerization of ethylene carbonate using KOH as initiator at 200Â°C for 7 h. The molecular weight (1200-3400) and yield
(40-80%) of the polymer were determined. The structure analysis using IR and NMR techniques showed the presence of
carbonate and ether linkages in the polymer.
front.keyword: Keywords: Polycarbonate, Ethylene carbonate, Ring opening polymerization
